page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most of the people who live here leave the village to work,many travelling by car to Ipswich, Colchester or Brantham. Quite a few people commute to London catching a train from Ipswich or Manningtree.The journey takes about an hour and the line was electrified this year.Others travel to London by car along the A12. There are few opportunities for employment within the area itself.Some men are farm labourers and Mr Lee employs 2 part time workers in his shop.The school secretary ,headmaster and ancillary helper all live locally. The only local firm is Doubles Eng.Works on the outskirts of the village.They do general welding jobs and employ 7 full time and 4 casual workers who travel in from surrounding villages e.g.Freston and Bentley.
